医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
给你的羽衣甘蓝汁增压：发酵增强抗氧化和抗炎能力根据《抗氧化剂》杂志上的一项新研究，用柠檬酸乳杆菌菌株发酵羽衣甘蓝汁可增强其抗氧化和抗炎特性。研究表明，这种细菌强化果汁可以增强健康益处，包括提高槲皮素和山奈酚等有益植物营养素的含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Supercharge-your-kale-juice-Fermentation-ramps-up-antibiotic-and-anti-lingual-powers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Supercharge-your-kale-juice-Fermentation-ramps-up-antibiotic-and-anti-lingual-powers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5ad4c30-aa74-4a77-8059-87f359b692a0 Sun, 15 Oct 2023 18:03:00 -0400 Supercharge your kale juice: Fermentation ramps up antioxidant and anti-inflammatory powers
激素和高血压：研究揭示内分泌罪魁祸首和针对性治疗研究人员深入研究了高血压 (HTN) 的内分泌原因，揭示了原发性醛固酮增多症和库欣综合征等关键罪魁祸首。该研究还评估了各种治疗方法的功效，为解决这一广泛的健康问题提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Hormones-and-high-blood-Pressure-Study-reveals-endocrine-culprits-and-targeted-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Hormones-and-high-blood-Pressure-Study-reveals-endocrine-culprits-and-targeted-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60f1d604-0469-4b32-bfdd-4192ba2f1f59 Sun, 15 Oct 2023 17:49:00 -0400 Hormones and high blood pressure: Study reveals endocrine culprits and targeted treatments
新研究表明，仅靠父母就可以像全家庭干预一样有效地解决儿童肥胖问题这项发表在《国际肥胖杂志》上的研究系统地回顾了仅以家长为基础的团体干预措施在管理儿童肥胖和相关健康行为方面的有效性。报告得出的结论是，仅限家长的计划在改善儿童体重和体重指数方面与以家庭为中心的干预措施同样有效，但也强调了诸如较高的辍学率和需要强有力的家庭支持等挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Parents-alone-can-tackle-childhood-obesity-just-as-efficiently-as-whole-family-interventions-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Parents-alone-can-tackle-childhood-obesity-just-as-efficiently-as-whole-family-interventions-new-study-shows.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a1d988e-096e-46df-b3d4-bf8b67d10e6b Sun, 15 Oct 2023 17:39:00 -0400 Parents alone can tackle childhood obesity just as effectively as whole-family interventions, new study shows
研究发现季节性训练轮换不会影响橄榄球运动员的心脏健康在一项检查男性橄榄球联盟 (RFL) 男性运动员心脏功能的综合研究中，研究人员发现，即使训练负荷发生变化，心血管健康在赛季的不同阶段仍保持稳定。该研究利用二维超声心动图和斑点追踪超声心动图等先进工具，挑战了之前的假设，为未来的研究打开了大门，强调了此类指标在参与前心脏筛查中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Seasonal-training-shifts-dont-shake-rugby-players-heart-health-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Seasonal-training-shifts-dont-shake-rugby-players-heart-health-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2501075c-56a0-48d9-afe1-63e987d1ebdd Sun, 15 Oct 2023 02:30:00 -0400 Seasonal training shifts don't shake rugby players' heart health, finds study
辉瑞澳大利亚和 BioNTech 宣布 TGA 批准 Omicron XBB.1.5 适应单价 COVID-19 疫苗辉瑞澳大利亚公司和 BioNTech SE 今天宣布，治疗用品管理局 (TGA) 已授权该公司的 XBB.1.5 适应单价 COVID-19 疫苗 (COMIRNATY® Omicron XBB.1.5) 用于 5 岁及以上的个体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Pfizer-Australia-and-BioNTech-announce-TGA-approval-for-Omicron-XBB15-adapted-monovalent-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Pfizer-Australia-and-BioNTech-announce-TGA-approval-for-Omicron-XBB15-adapted-monovalent-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a7ff​​6b3-718e-4776-99a2-195836fc12b1 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:48:00 -0400 Pfizer Australia and BioNTech announce TGA approval for Omicron XBB.1.5-adapted monovalent COVID-19 vaccine
欧盟需要行动计划为罕见疾病提供更好的诊断和治疗在毕尔巴鄂会议上，欧洲经济和社会委员会（EESC）敦促欧盟启动一项欧洲行动计划，加强各国卫生系统之间的合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/European-Union-needs-action-plan-to-provide-better-diagnoses-treatment-for-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/European-Union-needs-action-plan-to-provide-better-diagnoses-treatment-for-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caa271c5-94c4-4309-87e5-b35532fd1602 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:46:00 -0400 European Union needs action plan to provide better diagnoses, treatment for rare diseases
盖茨基金会宣布投资推进 mRNA 疫苗研究和制造在 2023 年重大挑战年会上，比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会联合主席比尔·盖茨宣布进行新投资，以推进 mRNA 研究和疫苗制造技术的普及，从而支持中低收入国家 (LMIC) 的产能大规模开发高质量、拯救生命的疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Gates-Foundation-announces-investments-to-advance-mRNA-vaccine-research-and-manufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Gates-Foundation-announces-investments-to-advance-mRNA-vaccine-research-and-manufacturing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ae154f3-9968-416e-924d-6c46800c7bf3 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:45:00 -0400 Gates Foundation announces investments to advance mRNA vaccine research and manufacturing
减肥饮料可能会影响血糖水平、胰岛素抵抗和肠道微生物群可乐等“全脂”含糖饮料会增加肥胖风险，通常是糖尿病患者的禁忌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Diet-drinks-may-affect-blood-sugar-levels-insulin-resistance-and-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Diet-drinks-may-affect-blood-sugar-levels-insulin-resistance-and-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9368d419-2749-4647-a501-aa24e68d4335 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:42:00 -0400 Diet drinks may affect blood sugar levels, insulin resistance and gut microbiome
阿斯利康公布 2023 年研发博士后挑战赛获奖者阿斯利康今天宣布了 2023 年研发博士后挑战赛的八名获奖者，并同意资助他们在位于英国剑桥、盖瑟斯堡或波士顿或瑞典哥德堡的公司战略研发中心之一的博士后职位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/AstraZeneca-announces-winners-of-the-2023-RD-PostDoctor-Challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/AstraZeneca-announces-winners-of-the-2023-RD-Post doctor-Challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68e56976-9f43-4bbf-8357-ff9d8dc81477 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:40:00 -0400 AstraZeneca announces winners of the 2023 R&D Postdoctoral Challenge
新发现的合成佐剂材料可以使疫苗更容易获得、更可持续已经发现了新的疫苗原料，可以使疫苗更容易获得、可持续且合乎道德。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Newly-discovered-synthetic-adjuvant-materials-could-make-vaccines-more-accessible-sustainable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231014/Newly-discovered-synthetic-adjuvant-materials-could-make-vaccines-more-accessible-sustainable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=795b24f1-1bb6-41f2-b144-0972e3124a98 Sat, 14 Oct 2023 06:38:00 -0400 Newly discovered synthetic adjuvant materials could make vaccines more accessible, sustainable
